content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of two parallel smelting setups:
- Furnace at (1,1) with burner inserter at (1.5,2.5) outputting to wooden chest at (1.5,3.5)
- Furnace at (3,1) with burner inserter at (3.5,2.5) outputting to wooden chest at (3.5,3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4, y=7-9.5)
Consists of two parallel smelting setups:
- Furnace at (2,7) with burner inserter at (2.5,8.5) outputting to wooden chest at (2.5,9.5)
- Furnace at (4,7) with burner inserter at (4.5,8.5) outputting to wooden chest at (4.5,9.5)
Connected by transport belts for material movement

### Copper Cable Production Line (Position x=14.5, y=11.5-14.5)
- Assembling machine at (14.5,14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5,11.5) containing copper plates
- Burner inserter at (14.5,12.5) moving materials from input chest
- Output handled by inserter system at (16.5,14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position x=21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
- Assembling machine at (21.5,15.5)
- Input chests at (21.5,11.5) and (21.5,12.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at (21.5,13.5) moving materials

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5) producing water
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5) connected to water system
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Connected by pipe network (fluid system 3763)

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production lines:
- Belt system connecting copper plate production (x=2.5-4.5, y=8.5)
- Extended belt network moving materials between production areas (multiple segments)

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Errors
- Ensure boilers are fueled with coal before attempting to insert items
- Connect all power components properly to establish working electricity network

### Assembly Machine Issues
- Ensure assembly machines are connected to power network to function
- Verify proper input/output connections for material flow

### Inserter Placement Issues
- Check for proper clearance and valid drop locations when placing inserters
- Ensure destination containers have space before attempting item transfers

### Fluid System Setup
- Connect all fluid-carrying entities properly to establish working fluid networks
- Verify pipe connections between offshore pumps, boilers, and steam engines
